ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ pound small shrimp, peeled, deveined and cooked
1 large orange, peeled and cut into half slices
⅓ cup chopped red bell pepper
4 cups DOLE® Hearts of Romaine or other DOLE Salad blend

cookingTips: Use already-cooked shrimp to simplify preparation and reduce cooking time
Toss salad gently with dressing just before serving to maintain crispness of greens
Prepare dressing and components separately for better flavor control
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through creating a light, refreshing shrimp salad with citrus notes. Emphasize proper timing of dressing application and using quality precooked shrimp for convenience.
